scripts.deploy:
npm run build && git add dist && git commit -m 'Deploy component' --allow-empty && git push && echo '
âœ… Deployed!' && echo 'Use this URL (commit hash for instant update):' && echo "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/NicolasVelay/component-dynamic@$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)/dist/external-component.js"
